English: the three provinces of Northeast China, namely: Liaoning Province `遼寧省~|辽`宁~`省~[Liao2 ning2 Sheng3], Jilin Province `吉林省~[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3] and Heilongjiang Province `黑龍江省~|`黑~龙`江~`省~[Hei1 long2 jiang1 Sheng3]

d.f: `東北~`遼~`寧~、`吉林~、`黑龍江~`三省~`的~`總稱~，`抗戰勝利~`後~`改制~`為~「`東北九省~」。

English: the three provinces of Northeast China, namely: Liaoning Province `遼寧省~|辽`宁~`省~[Liao2 ning2 Sheng3], Jilin Province `吉林省~[Ji2 lin2 Sheng3] and Heilongjiang Province `黑龍江省~|`黑~龙`江~`省~[Hei1 long2 jiang1 Sheng3]
